about-me.title: About Me
about-me.detail: I'm a self-taught software engineer focused on front-end while having back-end experiences. I love writing structured code and open-source spirits. Able to refactor a big project with a mindset of clean code. *Standing on the shoulders of giants keeps me improving.*

tech-stack.title: Tech Stack
tech-stack.detail: Keywords: __React, Web Component, BEM, Redux, Webpack, Vim__. You may want to read narrative details here: [README.md](https://github.com/hankchiutw/hankchiutw.github.io#hankchiutw)

stacks.title: UI template
stacks.subTitle: React, lit-element, Storybook
stacks.detail: The reason why using UI libraries is that things will go messy if you define layout by HTML and operate on DOM elements by `document.querySelector` or jQuery.

stacks.title: Styling

stacks.detail: CSS is good enough for many cases, especially [CSS var()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/var) is useful for theming. The key question is how to do styling in a maintainable and scalable way.
